data.actual_result: the text keeps going till it goes off the screen
data.expected_result: the playing status text should stop in the middle of the bar
data.short_description: Users with a long playing status text keeps going till it goes off the screen in the "invite a friend in your group dm" page
data.steps_to_repro: - create a group dm- click add friends to group dms- scroll till you see someone with a long playing status
